reviewText: Disappointed the series is not available in either region 1 or 2.

Sorry to find that this gem is currently unavailable. I watched every episode of it on PBS years ago and loved every minute of it. This is the only treatment of the old  May - December plot that I've ever thoroughly enjoyed. Anton Rogers is one of Britain's best comedic actors & I'd watch him in anything. The acting is extraordinary and the characters are lovable and believable. PLEASE bring this back !
